scripts.build: npm run shared:build && npm run api:build && npm run web:build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n SHARED,API,WEB -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run shared:dev" "npm run api:dev" "npm run web:dev"
scripts.dev:lan: concurrently -n SHARED,API,WEB -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run shared:dev" "npm run api:dev" "npm run web:dev:lan"
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules packages/**/dist apps/**/dist package-lock.json
scripts.port:free:3333: powershell -Command "$tcpPid=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3333 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).OwningProcess; if($tcpPid){Stop-Process -Id $tcpPid -Force; Write-Host 'Killed ' $tcpPid} else { Write-Host '3333 livre' }"
